import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-us', templateUrl: './about-us.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-us.component.css'] }) export class AboutUSComponent { }

About VG Furniture

Crafting Comfort. Designing Happiness.

Who We Are

VG Furniture is dedicated to creating high-quality, stylish, and affordable furniture that transforms houses into beautiful homes. We blend modern design with comfort and durability.

With years of experience in the furniture industry, we focus on craftsmanship, customer satisfaction, and innovative designs that suit every lifestyle.
